source: Programmatically generated from NERDC/WAEC official curriculum frameworks

lo_entries.subject: MAT
lo_entries.lo_text: Understand place value, operations on whole numbers, fractions, decimals and percentages

lo_entries.subject: MAT
lo_entries.lo_text: Simplify algebraic expressions, solve linear equations, use index laws

lo_entries.subject: MAT
lo_entries.lo_text: Identify angles, shapes, perimeter and area concepts

lo_entries.subject: MAT
lo_entries.lo_text: Solve quadratic equations by factorization, completing square and formula

lo_entries.subject: MAT
lo_entries.lo_text: Understand sine, cosine, tangent ratios for right-angled triangles

lo_entries.subject: MAT
lo_entries.lo_text: Collect, organize and present data using tables, charts, graphs

lo_entries.subject: MAT
lo_entries.lo_text: Understand limits, differentiation of algebraic functions

lo_entries.subject: MAT
lo_entries.lo_text: Calculate measures of central tendency, dispersion and probability

lo_entries.subject: MAT
lo_entries.lo_text: Find distance between points, slope, equation of lines and curves

lo_entries.subject: ENG
lo_entries.lo_text: Develop reading fluency and comprehension of diverse texts

lo_entries.subject: ENG
lo_entries.lo_text: Recognize and use academic and colloquial vocabulary in context

lo_entries.subject: ENG
lo_entries.lo_text: Speak fluently with correct pronunciation, intonation and stress

lo_entries.subject: ENG
lo_entries.lo_text: Identify main ideas, supporting details, infer meaning from passages

lo_entries.subject: ENG
lo_entries.lo_text: Write coherent narratives with clear plot, setting and characterization

lo_entries.subject: ENG
lo_entries.lo_text: Use correct tenses, voice and reported speech in writing

lo_entries.subject: ENG
lo_entries.lo_text: Plan and produce essays with clear paragraphing and argument structure

lo_entries.subject: ENG
lo_entries.lo_text: Apply correct grammar, sentence structure and punctuation

lo_entries.subject: ENG
lo_entries.lo_text: Identify themes, characterization and literary devices in texts

lo_entries.subject: BIO
lo_entries.lo_text: Describe prokaryotic and eukaryotic cell structure and function

lo_entries.subject: BIO
lo_entries.lo_text: Understand nutrition types and nutrient functions in organisms

lo_entries.subject: BIO
lo_entries.lo_text: Explain asexual reproduction in plants and animals

lo_entries.subject: BIO
lo_entries.lo_text: Describe mitosis and meiosis, understand genetic significance

lo_entries.subject: BIO
lo_entries.lo_text: Understand dominant and recessive traits, Punnett squares

lo_entries.subject: BIO
lo_entries.lo_text: Describe food chains, food webs and energy flow in ecosystems

lo_entries.subject: BIO
lo_entries.lo_text: Apply Mendel's laws to predict inheritance patterns

lo_entries.subject: BIO
lo_entries.lo_text: Describe ecosystems, biomes and human impact on environment

lo_entries.subject: BIO
lo_entries.lo_text: Explain adaptation, natural selection and speciation concepts

lo_entries.subject: CHEM
lo_entries.lo_text: Describe atomic structure, ionization and chemical bonding

lo_entries.subject: CHEM
lo_entries.lo_text: Identify element patterns, groups and periods on periodic table

lo_entries.subject: CHEM
lo_entries.lo_text: Perform simple calculations using chemical formulas and equations

lo_entries.subject: CHEM
lo_entries.lo_text: Perform stoichiometric calculations and balance chemical equations

lo_entries.subject: CHEM
lo_entries.lo_text: Identify properties of acids and bases, pH scale, neutralization

lo_entries.subject: CHEM
lo_entries.lo_text: Identify oxidation states, oxidizing and reducing agents

lo_entries.subject: CHEM
lo_entries.lo_text: Identify functional groups and name simple organic molecules

lo_entries.subject: CHEM
lo_entries.lo_text: Classify reactions and predict products for common reaction types

lo_entries.subject: CHEM
lo_entries.lo_text: Understand exothermic and endothermic reactions, enthalpy changes

lo_entries.subject: PHY
lo_entries.lo_text: Describe displacement, velocity, acceleration and solve motion problems

lo_entries.subject: PHY
lo_entries.lo_text: Understand Newton's laws, weight and friction

lo_entries.subject: PHY
lo_entries.lo_text: Describe properties of waves, sound propagation and reflection

lo_entries.subject: PHY
lo_entries.lo_text: Apply Newton's laws to solve problems with forces

lo_entries.subject: PHY
lo_entries.lo_text: Understand work, energy, power and conservation principles

lo_entries.subject: PHY
lo_entries.lo_text: Understand electric fields, potential difference and current

lo_entries.subject: PHY
lo_entries.lo_text: Analyze simple DC circuits using Ohm's law and combinations

lo_entries.subject: PHY
lo_entries.lo_text: Describe magnetic fields, electromagnetic induction and applications

lo_entries.subject: PHY
lo_entries.lo_text: Understand atomic structure, nuclear reactions and radioactivity

lo_entries.subject: ICT
lo_entries.lo_text: Understand basic computer components, storage and software concepts

lo_entries.subject: ICT
lo_entries.lo_text: Understand basic networking concepts: LAN, WAN, IP addressing

lo_entries.subject: ICT
lo_entries.lo_text: Use browsers, email, search engines and web safety practices

lo_entries.subject: ICT
lo_entries.lo_text: Identify and describe computer hardware components and peripherals

lo_entries.subject: ICT
lo_entries.lo_text: Use productivity software: word processor, spreadsheets, presentations

lo_entries.subject: ICT
lo_entries.lo_text: Understand tables, records, fields and simple database operations

lo_entries.subject: ICT
lo_entries.lo_text: Write simple programs using variables, conditionals and loops

lo_entries.subject: ICT
lo_entries.lo_text: Create web pages using HTML and basic CSS styling

lo_entries.subject: ICT
lo_entries.lo_text: Understand threats, protection measures and ethical hacking basics

lo_entries.subject: CIV
lo_entries.lo_text: Describe rights and responsibilities of citizens and basics of governance

lo_entries.subject: CIV
lo_entries.lo_text: Understand the Nigerian Constitution and separation of powers

lo_entries.subject: CIV
lo_entries.lo_text: Identify human rights, freedoms and social responsibilities

lo_entries.subject: CIV
lo_entries.lo_text: Compare forms of government and explain basic institutions

lo_entries.subject: CIV
lo_entries.lo_text: Understand elections, representation and democratic processes

lo_entries.subject: CIV
lo_entries.lo_text: Identify conflict sources and resolution mechanisms

lo_entries.subject: CIV
lo_entries.lo_text: Examine leadership qualities and good governance practices

lo_entries.subject: CIV
lo_entries.lo_text: Understand justice system, courts and the legal process

lo_entries.subject: CIV
lo_entries.lo_text: Explore socio-economic development and peace-building

lo_entries.subject: AGRIC
lo_entries.lo_text: Identify soil types, composition and importance to agriculture

lo_entries.subject: AGRIC
lo_entries.lo_text: Understand basic crop husbandry and growth stages

lo_entries.subject: AGRIC
lo_entries.lo_text: Identify crop pests, diseases and simple control measures

lo_entries.subject: AGRIC
lo_entries.lo_text: Understand basic crop husbandry practices and soil management

lo_entries.subject: AGRIC
lo_entries.lo_text: Identify livestock types and basic animal husbandry practices

lo_entries.subject: AGRIC
lo_entries.lo_text: Identify and use basic agricultural tools and equipment

lo_entries.subject: AGRIC
lo_entries.lo_text: Explain soil composition, fertility and management practices

lo_entries.subject: AGRIC
lo_entries.lo_text: Understand crop rotation, intercropping and organic farming

lo_entries.subject: AGRIC
lo_entries.lo_text: Explore agricultural advisory services and modern farming techniques
